channel.title: MetalLB on Kubernetes By Example

item.description: âª ğŸ Â Guided Exercise: Installing Metallb on a Minikube Cluster In this exercise, you will deploy the MetalLB add-on on a minikube cluster. Outcomes You should be able to: Create a minikube instance. Get the DHCP network parameters of the minikube VM driver. Enable and configure the MetalLB minikube add-on.
Â ğŸ â© MetalLB MetalLB is a load balancer suitable for local environments, it is included as an add-on in minikube. https://metallb.universe.tf/ Â ğŸ â©
